trans-unit.source: Represents a serializable collection of service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en serialiserbar samling av tjenestemetadata i XML-skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataSet class contains a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects, each of which contains one dialect of metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MetadataSet inneholder en samling av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>objekter, som inneholder en dialekt av metadata i XML-skjema.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the MetadataSet class is used to pass a group of XML metadata documents to and from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> objects, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MetadataSet brukes vanligvis til å sende en gruppe i XML-metadata dokumenter til og fra <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter>objekter, for eksempel <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>

trans-unit.source: To create a MetadataSet from a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en MetadataSet fra en <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>objekt av typen <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: To obtain a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ikke hente en <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>objekt av typen <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, bruker du <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> method to load a MetadataSet from XML data and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> method to write the internal metadata to an XML format.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du bruke den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>metode for å laste inn en MetadataSet fra XML-data og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A>metoden til å skrive intern metadataene i et XML-format.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type implements the structure defined in the WS-MetadataExchange specification.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen implementerer strukturen er definert i WS MetadataExchange-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>objektet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class that contains the specified collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> klassen som inneholder den angitte objektsamlingen <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from `sections`.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>fra `sections`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The metadata values that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> is to contain.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene verdier som den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> skal inneholde.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> objekter som vises i serialisert formatet i <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> objekter som vises i serialisert formatet i <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> objekter som representerer metadataene.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> objekter som representerer metadataene.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> fra den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>fra en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The reader to read in XML.
trans-unit.target: Leseren til å lese i XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> that contains all the metadata present in the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> som inneholder alle metadata som er angitt i XML-strømmen.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Leseren er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*> method to provide serialization support.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>metoden gir støtte for serialisering.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> method and accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>-objektet som beskriver XML-representasjon av objektet som er generert av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> metoden og tilgang til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> metode.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*> method to support deserialization from XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>metode for å støtte deserialisering fra XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>

trans-unit.source: The reader to use when reading XML.
trans-unit.target: Leseren til bruk ved lesing av XML.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Leseren er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*> method to support serialization to XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>metode for å støtte serialisering til XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use when writing XML.
trans-unit.target: Skriveren skal brukes under skriving av XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skriveren er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> to XML using the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Skriver den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> til XML med den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> to an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>til en XML-dataflyt.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use to write the XML.
trans-unit.target: Skriveren skal brukes til å skrive til XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skriveren er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
